Module AppointmentScheduler
Package Utilities

Class TimeConverter

java.lang.Object
Utilities.TimeConverter
public abstract class TimeConverter extends Object
The Abstract TimeConverter class is a utility that converts different timezones (e.g. the business EST time, local machine time, and database UTC time), stores business hours of operation and determines other time/date calculations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Michael Short

    • duringBusinessHours

      public static boolean duringBusinessHours(LocalDateTime selectedStartDateTime, LocalDateTime selectedEndDateTime)
      Utility function that determines whether a LocalDateTime range is within business hours. Converts and compares from business EST to UTC vs local machine time to UTC.
      Parameters:
      selectedStartDateTime - start date and time range
      selectedEndDateTime - end date and time range
      Returns:
      a bool of whether the range is within business hours
